name: ✋
description:
Press the fullscreen button for best playing condition

Controls :  Keyboard

Mouse + WASD to move.

Left mouse button to interact

Use mouse wheel  to change sign.

Gamepad

Left joystick to move

Right joystick to look around

Press A to interact

R1/L1 to change sign.

if the webGL version is too big for your browser you can download the windows version

We'll try to build a mac version soon(if the shaders work)

made by hand by Paulock and Tymus

you can listen to the OST here

thank you for playing
